name: Way Down (Stapz, Yamih, JeanDan)
description:
Pitch

  • In the 50’s, The Godfather of San Francisco’s Italian mob, Lima, is charged with grand theft, but the straw man that was chosen to take his place is found dead. Play Bugsy Rosenthal, a private detective used by the mob to solve this case that seems to go way deeper than a simple homicide.

Development team :

Jordan Da Rocha : Producer / Lead / Narrative Designer / Game Designer

Sébastien Bréda : Narrative Designer / Game Designer / Lead Sound Designer

Lucas Blondet : Lead Artist /  Game Designer / Sound Designer

Killian Beguerie : Game Designer / Lead Gameplay - Tool Programmer

Audience is for 18+ (Theme)

We do not own rights for musics and for some visuals. all credits are for their creators
